title: Secure User Authentication System
description: Implement a robust user authentication system with secure login, session management, and password recovery to enable authorized access to the application.
iWant: a secure login system with email/password authentication and session management
soThat: I can safely access my account and protect my personal data from unauthorized access
acceptanceCriteria: Users can register with email and password meeting security requirements
Login validates credentials and creates secure session tokens
Password reset functionality sends secure recovery emails
Failed login attempts are rate-limited after 5 consecutive failures
Sessions automatically expire after 24 hours of inactivity
